name: Zombona (ClickbaitProductions)
description:
It's a 3D isometric shooting game, revolving around our journey since 2020, since the dawn of the pandemic. The game is a light hearted take on "if the Corona virus was deadlier", where the citizens go into a zombie like frenzy and it's your job to fight them off and cure as many as you can, who'll then help join you in battle. You are back in 2020 now, good luck!

Keep yourself alive through effective "social distancing", curing as many zombies as possible to make them your allies, and shooting the rest. Use your limited number of masks to give yourself temporary immunity to get out of tight spots

All instructions are given in-game

Be sure to check out the endless mode at the end to set your high score!

Also shoot the barrels to make  them explode and kill large hordes of neighbouring zombies!
